nodes.title: Cellular Optimization
nodes.content:
[[ATP (Adenosine Triphosphate)]]

Cellular optimization is the gateway to enhanced energy, longevity, and inner vitality. This realm of the map reveals the deep science of your biological power plants â€” the mitochondria â€” and how to tune your body at the atomic level.
